citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility did not have a documented environment enhancement plan for any of their avian species. Failure to develop
and document an environmental enrichment program for birds can negatively impact their health and well-being, causing
unnecessary psychological distress. The facility must develop, document and follow a species appropriate plan for
environmental enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of birds. The plan must be approved by
the attending veterinarian, and at a minimum must address social grouping, environmental enrichment, special
considerations, restraint, any exemptions to the plan, and be in accordance with currently accepted professional
standards. Correct by Sept 1, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility did not have a documented environment enhancement plan for any of their avian species. Failure to develop 
and document an environmental enrichment program for birds can negatively impact their health and well-being, causing 
unnecessary psychological distress. The facility must develop, document and follow a species appropriate plan for 
environmental enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of birds. The plan must be approved by 
the attending veterinarian, and at a minimum must address social grouping, environmental enrichment, special 
considerations, restraint, any exemptions to the plan, and be in accordance with currently accepted professional 
standards. Correct by Sept 1, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
